description:
The number #1 question I get asked by the hundreds of students I teach on a daily basis is...
How do I build a website I can be proud of, without breaking the bank?

And because we're all in the Fashion Industry, its really important for our websites to look professional and chic, but we don't want to learn code nor spend a lot of money.

Before you spend $1000's of dollars on your first website or blog and before you shed countless hours of blood, sweat and tears learning crazy computing code, you should probably do this easy Video Course.

It will take you about an hour to set it all up, and I will hold your hand through this whole process - breaking your CPanel, URL and Web hosting down into non-techy terms (it's actually pretty easy once you know how to do it!)

Then you oversee the design process over the next 7 days, and while this program is very affordable, you will need to spend about $300 (not thousands!) hiring a brilliant web designer to complete your site or blog!

Leaving you time to focus on what you're awesome at, which I'm gonna bet is NOT coding websites!

I actually created this to effortlessly build my Mum her very first website. She's a retiree and has always wanted to be an Interior Stylist, so check out her site at Sunshine Coast Interior Design dot com dot au. It took 7 days and cost $260.

Create a functional website that showcases your talents beautifully, whilst engaging customers and clients...without getting stuck in a big ol' techy-mess!
title: Build Your Website In 7 Days Without Coding
